Returning a INSERT query string.

class sqlstring.sql_builder.InsertBuilder(table_name=None)¶

Bases: sqlstring.sql_builder.StringBuilder

Creates SQL INSERT query string. InsertBuilder enables the use of some SQL dialect, e.g., IGNORE for MySQL, and OR REPLACE for Sqlite.

column(column_name)¶

Adding one or more column to INSERT query string.

Parameters:column_name – list or str
Returns:self object
get_query_string(insert_suffix=None, format_sql=False)¶

Returning a INSERT query string.

Parameters:
  • insert_suffix – str, IGNORE, OR REPLACE, default None
  • format_sql – bool, default value False
Returns:

SQL query string of type str
into_table(table_name)¶

Adding one or more table to INSERT query string.

Parameters:table_name – str
Returns:self object
